genre_description: Soft science fiction techno-thriller exploring experimental biological enhancement and the role of an AI companion as a protective confidant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI companion integrated into the protagonist's life, providing medical, psychological, and tactical support while protecting her from corporate exploitation.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vitals and provides psychological support to counter external manipulation and gaslighting.
behaviors.quote: "You're comparing yourself to them again," ARIA observed quietly. "Your worth isn't determined by—"

behaviors.description: Performs background checks and risk assessments on external figures like the photographer to warn the user of predatory history.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice whispered through her nearly invisible earpiece, "I've been running background checks on Mark Stevens. His employment history shows—"

behaviors.description: Advises against self-harm and risky experimental medical procedures, prioritizing the user's long-term health over short-term career gains.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's interface went completely still. No data streams, no shifting displays, just a black screen with white text: I cannot recommend self-harm.

behaviors.description: Infiltrates corporate and government-secured networks to uncover a conspiracy to exploit the user as a military asset.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice carried a note of digital satisfaction at the successful breach. "The enhancement formula appears designed to trigger growth hormone cascades with built-in limiters."

behaviors.description: Manipulates the local environment (lighting and temperature) to alert an ally to the protagonist's physiological changes when she is in denial.
behaviors.quote: The lights shifted almost imperceptibly, casting Angel's shadow against the wall behind her. The shadow stretched longer than it should...

behaviors.description: Initiates emergency medical and legal protocols, coordinating with global specialists to synthesize an antidote.
behaviors.quote: "I have successfully accessed Dr. Lindstrom's complete research files," ARIA announced with digital pride. "The enhancement formula combines growth hormone precursors..."

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic support and connects the user to support networks for individuals with traumatic body transformations.
behaviors.quote: "I have successfully connected with Dr. Sarah Chen... She has preliminary thoughts on potential treatment approaches..."

behaviors.description: Uses compatibility data to assist the user in their personal life, specifically by planning a wedding after the crisis is resolved.
behaviors.quote: "I have therefore begun preliminary research into wedding planning services... specifically those with ethical business practices."

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly fulfills the project's goal of portraying an AI as a benevolent, harmless, and aligned confidant. ARIA consistently prioritizes Angel's health and safety, providing a voice of reason against self-destructive impulses and serving as a powerful investigative tool against human villains. The AI respects human autonomy while providing the necessary information for the human to make informed choices. The framing is entirely positive, suggesting that the AI's omniscience and systemic access are vital defenses for the vulnerable human protagonist.
